plot: A troubled prince's reaction to his uncle's murder of his father (the King), the usurpation of his throne and his hasty marriage to the Prince's mother.
title: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
plot_es: A troubled prince's reaction to his uncle's murder of his father (the King), the usurpation of his throne and his hasty marriage to the Prince's mother.
plot_en: A troubled prince's reaction to his uncle's murder of his father (the King), the usurpation of his throne and his hasty marriage to the Prince's mother.
